Skip to main content Re-Rentals Toggle navigation Home Available Rentals ​ Affordable Studio Apartment - 1034 Kelly Street Recently built studio in Hunts Point, Bronx, featuring an open layout, modern finishes, and plenty of natural light. Located in a well-maintained building with secure entry, close to parks, shops, and public transportation. A great option for affordable and contemporary living in a vibrant neighborhood. Apply Now ​​ 446 Cyrus Place 1-Bedroom Apartment Bright 1-bedroom apartment at 446 Cyrus Place, just minutes from Fordham University, Arthur Avenue, and nearby parks. This home features a modern layout with a full kitchen, great natural light, and is in a well-maintained building close to shopping, dining, and public transportation. Apply Now ​ Luxury 1-bed Apartment - 1015 E Gun Hill Road Modern 1-bedroom apartment available at 1015 E Gun Hill Road in the Bronx. This newly built building features an elevator, on-site laundry, and comfortable living in a convenient location. Don’t miss the chance to apply for this fresh, move-in ready home! Apply Now ​ Convenient 1-bed Apartment - 2325 Beaumont Avenue Live comfortably at 2325 Beaumont Avenue, perfectly situated near local schools, shopping, and dining. With easy access to the 2 and 5 subway lines, residents enjoy seamless connections throughout the city while being part of a vibrant, welcoming Bronx community. Apply Now ​​ Penthouse Studio - 967 East 167th Street Discover this bright studio apartment at 967 East 167th Street in Crotona Park East — a comfortable, modern space perfect for city living. Enjoy an efficient layout, updated finishes, and close proximity to the 2, 5, and 6 trains, neighborhood shops, and parks. Ideal for anyone seeking convenience and comfort in the heart of the Bronx. https://www.langsampropertyservices.com/: Affordable Rental Opportunities (718) 518-8000 1601 Bronxdale Avenue Bronx, NY 10462 Standard Operating Procedure Home Property Management Construction Services Asset Management Projects About Us Forms Team Contact Affordable Rental Opportunities Affordable housing for rent: 603 Pontiac Place unit #3C, Bronx NY 10455 1 bedroom apartment, 1 bathroom apartment, 538 sqft Rent $1,362.00 Amenities: Roof Terrace, Bicycle Storage, Elevator, Laundry Room (* additional fees apply) Transit: Trains: 2/5; Buses: Bx42, Bx40, Bx4A Unit Size 80% AREA MEDIAN INCOME (AMI) UNITS Monthly Rent 1 Units Available Household Size 2 Annual Household Income 3 Minimum - Maximum 4 1 bedroom $1,362.00 1 → 1 person $50,434 - $90,720 2 people $50,434 - $103,680 3 people $50,434 - $116,640 Tenant is responsible for electricity Household size includes everyone who will live with you, including parents and children. Subject to occupancy criteria. Household earnings includes salary, hourly wages, tips, Social Security, child support, and other income. Income guidelines subject to change. Minimum income listed may not apply to applicants with Section 8 or other qualifying rental subsidies. Asset limits also apply For more information or to apply: recerts@langsamprop.com 718-518-8000 ext. 274” Ask A Question Enter Your First Name Enter Your Last Name Enter Your Email Address Enter Your Phone Number Comments Our Location 1601 Bronxdale Avenue Bronx, NY 10462 Langsam Property Services Corp. is a Bronx-based real estate management company. The company is responsible for managing the day-to-day operation of approximately 350 buildings containing over 11,000 dwelling units and 300 commercial units. These buildings are located in the Bronx, Manhattan, Queens, Brooklyn, and lower Westchester County. When Mark Engel joined the organization in the mid 1970s, it managed 2,500 housing units. Langsam is designated as an Accredited Management Organization (AMO), a standard of excellence in management conferred by the Chicago-based, Institute of Real Estate Management (IREM). Langsam is one of only two AMO's in all of New York State which has four Certified Property Managers directing its property management teams. All of Langsam's managing agents are either Licensed Associate Real Estate Brokers or Sales Associates. Several are experienced in construction and design. Other professional staff have almost fifty years combined property management and support experience. Its Director of Operations holds a CPM designation and other staff hold advanced degrees in public finance and urban planning. Staff also have held high level positions in New York City government Langsam Property Services does not discriminate based on race, color, religion, national origin, sex, disability, familial status (minor children under the age of 18), age, sexual orientation, marital status, military status, lawful source of income (including housing voucher programs), gender identity or expression, arrest records, veteran status, and domestic violence victim status. © LANGSAM PROPERTY SERVICES All rights reserved admin login 1601 Bronxdale Avenue Bronx, NY 10462 ( FIND US ON MAP ) Tel: (718) 518-8000 / Fax: (718) 518-8585 Affordable Rental Opportunities PROVISION OF NOTICE BY HOUSING PROVIDERS OF TENANTS’ RIGHTS TO REASONABLE MODIFICATIONS AND ACCOMMODATIONS FOR PERSONS WITH DISABILITIES

Ground floor preschool facility with outdoor play area. Now Leasing Affordable Senior Apartments in the Bronx We are currently accepting applications for brand-new affordable apartments through the Project-Based Voucher (PBV) Section 8 Program. This community has been designed with comfort, accessibility, and long-term affordability in mind. Program & Eligibility These apartments are reserved for individuals or households where at least one member is age 62 or older at the time of application. Eligibility is determined by both age and household size, as well as income limits. Applicants must qualify for Section 8 housing assistance. Rent is calculated at 30% of household income, as determined by Section 8 guidelines, and includes utilities. Maximum annual household income to apply: $56,700. This building is part of the Senior Affordable Rental Apartments (SARA) Program and supported through the HOME Investment Partnerships Program (HOME) of the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development. What You’ll Need to Apply While requirements may vary from household to household, applicants should be prepared to provide: Proof of income for all household members Valid identification for each resident Documentation verifying household size and eligibility No application fees or deposits are required Applicants selected will also undergo program verification to confirm Section 8 eligibility. Advantages & Amenities This thoughtfully designed building provides a safe, welcoming, and convenient environment for seniors. Amenities include: – Shared laundry room with card-operated machines – Dedicated storage space for residents – Elevator access throughout the building – Accessible entrances for ease of mobility – Smoke-free living environment – Convenient access to public transportation (bus stop nearby) – Outdoor common areas to relax and enjoy fresh air -Free parking is available through a lottery system, with electric vehicle charging offered at applicable rates. How to Apply Applying is simple and can be done in one of two ways: Click Here to Print Application – Email completed applications to [email protected] – Paper applications may be hand delivered to: 217 Wyckoff Avenue, Brooklyn, NY 11237 View Fullscreen For questions about eligibility, applications, or the leasing process, please contact: Leasing Contact: Anaisa V. Villanueva Email: [email protected] Phone: 718-366-3800 Section 1.b.ii: Statement: “New York City is committed to the principle of inclusivity in all of its neighborhoods, including supporting New Yorkers to reside in neighborhoods of their choice, regardless of their neighborhood of origin and regardless of the neighborhood into which they want to move.” Neighborhood: Woodlawn Heights, Bronx Number of Units: 92 Status: Leasing Our Organization About RiseBoro Board & Staff Contact Us Join Us Annual Report Press Room Privacy Policy Accessibility Seniors Housing Education Health Empowerment Community Our Community Lives Changed Events The RiseBoro Newsletter Advocacy Volunteer Program Keep up with our community. https://www.prontohousingrentals.com/: Pronto Housing Rentals 0 Skip to Content About Team Login Open Menu Close Menu About Team Login Open Menu Close Menu About Team Login NY + NYC Affordable Housing Availabilities How Do You Apply? The easiest way to apply is online! Simply click the “Apply to…” button for any property you’re interested in. This is the fastest and preferred way to be added to a property’s waitlist. If you already have a Pronto Housing account, you must use the EXACT SAME name, email & phone number. You cannot sign up with the same email or phone number but a different name. Questions? support@prontohousing.com . If you prefer a paper application ( one application per property ), you can download it here , fill it out, and mail it to: Pronto Housing, 240 West 40th Street, New York, NY 10018 Include a self-addressed envelope so a confirmation is sent back to you. If you want to apply to more than one property , you must clearly write the name of each property on the application. What Happens After You Submit Your Application? Applications are recorded in the order they are received . If you appear to meet the basic eligibility requirements, you will be contacted to provide documents that verify: Household size Identity of all household members Household income Disclaimer: Submitting an application in no way guarantees an apartment. Images should be deemed unreliable. The information below is for general browsing information only and should not be assumed as accurate.
